name: twiddling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
twiddle
to move something repeatedly between your fingers, especially without any purpose: She was twiddling (with) a pencil/her hair. Twiddle a dial/knob on a radio in the city and you may hear voices speaking Spanish, Chinese, Portuguese, or Russian.
